source:
TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_SEQ_00Zukin is seeing Red.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe
Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.

Les Rouges s'agitent un peu trop au goût de Zukin.

source: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_TODO_00<tab>Use Confederate explosives to destroy imperial crates on the Isle of Zekki.
target: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_TODO_00<tab>Utiliser les bombes de pirate pour détruire <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61EA8380302 /var> sur l'île de Zekki

source: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>The Red's recent activities give me cause for concern, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. They have begun moving their imperial weaponry out of storage. There can be no doubt─they are planning an assault, and we may well be the targets.
target: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>Les Rouges sont en train de préparer un mauvais couuuup<var 1D /var>! Ils ont récupéré des armes impériales sur l'île de Zekki et attendent le moment idéal pour lancer un assaut meurtrieeeer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>To see that this does not come to pass, I have a mind to sabotage these weapons. We have some Confederate explosives that would be suitable for this purpose, but they are not made for large Kojin hands.
target: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>Ils vont tenter de conquérir Tamamizu, j'en mets ma main à coupeeeer<var 1D /var>! Nous devons détruire leur armement avant qu'il ne soit trop tard, mais tu sais aussi bien que moi que les Kojin et les explosifs, ça fait deuuuux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>And so we must turn to you. I ask that you infiltrate the Red stronghold, the Isle of Zekki, and use the explosives to destroy the imperial crates that you see lying about. May the kami bless you and keep you!
target: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>Il n'y a plus une seconde à peeeerdre<var 1D /var>! Infiltre-toi sur l'île de Zekki et utilise ces bombes fabriquées par la Confédération pour détruire <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61EA8380302 /var> aussitôt que possiiiible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_100_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I've awaited your return with bated breath! Tell me you were able to destroy the weapons!
target: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_100_002<tab>Ah, c'est toiiii<var 1D /var>! Sommes-nous hors de dangeeeer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_003<tab>Oh, the relief! Thanks to you, we may rest easy for a while. But that is not to say we can afford to slacken our vigil.
target: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_003<tab>Ouf, me voilà grandement rassuréééé<var 1D /var>! Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que tu étais là, comme toujouuuurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_004<tab>Even assuming the Red are defanged for now, they can easily acquire more weapons from their imperial masters. We may well have need of your prowess again.
target: TEXT_BANKJN603_02999_ZUKIN_000_004<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, tout le monde sait que les Rouges ont longtemps collaboré avec l'Empiiiire... Si jamais ils tentent de remettre ça un de ces jours avec d'autres armes dont nous ne soupçonnions pas l'existence, je te le ferai savoiiiir.
